00030 #define MAXSTATES 100
00031 
00032 
00033 // generatate (n over m) ordered permutations in i[m]  
00034 
00035 int nextround(int i[], int n, int m, int k)
00036 {
00037   int j;
00038 
00039   if (k == -1) {
00040     return 0;
00041   }
00042   else if (i[k] == n-(m-k))
00043     return nextround(i, n, m, k-1);
00044   else {
00045     i[k]++;
00046     for (j=1; j<=m-k-1; j++)
00047       i[k+j] = i[k]+j;
00048     return 1;
00049   }
00050 }
00051 
00052 int nextpermutation(int i[], int n, int m)
00053 {
00054   if (i[m-1] == n-1)
00055     return nextround(i, n, m, m-2);
00056   else {
00057     i[m-1]++;
00058     return 1;
00059   }
00060 }
00061 
00062 // is k in i[n] ?
00063 int inidx(int i[], int n, int k)
00064 {
00065   int j;
00066   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00067     if (i[j] == k) return 1;
00068   
00069   return 0;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void intoidx(int idx[], int idxfix[], int iidxsel[], int ridxsel[], 
00073             int n, int m, int m0)
00074 {
00075   int k;
00076 
00077   for (k=0; k<m0; k++)
00078     idx[k] = idxfix[k];
00079 
00080   for (k=0; k<m; k++)
00081     idx[m0+k] = ridxsel[iidxsel[k]];
00082 }

00086 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00087 {
00088   createinfo(argc, argv);
00089 
00090   /* enough arguments ? */
00091 
00092   if (argc < 3) {
00093     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] PROJPAR INTERACTION M NUCSFILE" 
00094             "\n   -h             hermitize matrix elements"
00095             "\n   -A             show all eigenstates"
00096             "\n   -f FIXNUCSFILE select these configs in addition"
00097             "\n                  has to be a subset of NUCSFILE"
00098             "\n   -t THRESH      threshold for SVD\n", argv[0]);
00099     exit(-1);
00100   }
00101 
00102   int all=0;
00103   int hermit=0;
00104   int odd;
00105   int threshkmix=0.01;
00106   double minnormkmix=0.001;
00107   int threshmulti=0.0000001;
00108   double minnorm=0.001;
00109 
00110   char* fixmbfiles=NULL;
00111 
00112   /* manage command-line options */
00113 
00114   char c;
00115   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "hAt:f:")) != -1)
00116     switch (c) {
00117     case 'A':
00118       all=1;
00119       break;
00120     case 'h':
00121       hermit=1;
00122       break;
00123     case 't':
00124       threshmulti = atof(optarg);
00125       break;
00126     case 'f':
00127       fixmbfiles = optarg;
00128       break;
00129     }
00130 
00131   char* projpar = argv[optind];
00132   char* interactionfile = argv[optind+1];
00133   int m1 = atoi(argv[optind+2]);
00134   char* nucsfile = argv[optind+3];
00135 
00136   char* mbfile[MAXSTATES];
00137   int n;
00138 
00139   if (readstringsfromfile(nucsfile, &n, mbfile)) {
00140     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s\n", nucsfile);
00141     exit(-1);
00142   }
00143 
00144   SlaterDet Q[n]; 
00145   Symmetry S[n];
00146 
00147   int i;
00148   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00149     extractSymmetryfromString(&mbfile[i], &S[i]);
00150     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q[i], mbfile[i])) {
00151       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't read from %s\n", mbfile[i]);
00152       exit(-1);
00153     }
00154   }
00155 
00156   Interaction Int;
00157   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile)) {
00158     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't read Interaction from %s\n", interactionfile);
00159     exit(-1);
00160   }
00161   Int.cm = 1; 
00162 
00163 
00164   char* fixmbfile[MAXSTATES];
00165   int m0 = 0;
00166 
00167   // if specified read set of fixed configs
00168   if (fixmbfiles)
00169     if (readstringsfromfile(fixmbfiles, &m0, fixmbfile)) {
00170       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't read %s\n", fixmbfiles);
00171       exit(-1);
00172     }
00173 
00174   // find indices of fixed files
00175   
00176   int idxfix[m0];
00177 
00178   int k=0;
00179   for (i=0; i<m0; i++)
00180     for (k=0; k<n; k++)
00181       if (!strcmp(fixmbfile[i], mbfile[k])) {
00182         idxfix[i] = k;
00183         break;
00184       }
00185 
00186   // reverse indices for not fixed files
00187 
00188   int ridxsel[n-m0];
00189   int r;
00190 
00191   for (i=0; i<n-m0; i++) {
00192     r = (i == 0 ? 0 : ridxsel[i-1]+1);
00193     while (inidx(idxfix, m0, r))
00194       r++;
00195     ridxsel[i] = r;
00196   }
00197 
00198   int iidxsel[m1];
00199 
00200   for (i=0; i<m1; i++)
00201     iidxsel[i] = i;
00202 
00203   // odd number of nucleons ?
00204   odd = Q[0].A % 2;
00205 
00206   // Projection parameters
00207   Projection P;
00208   initProjection(&P, odd, projpar);
00209 
00210   initOpObservables(&Int);
00211 
00212   int a,b; 
00213 
00214   // initialize space for matrix elements
00215   Observablesod** obsme[n*n];
00216   for (b=0; b<n; b++)   
00217     for (a=0; a<n; a++)
00218       obsme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables);
00219 
00220   // read or calculate matrix elements
00221   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00222     for (a=0; a<n; a++)
00223       if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &P, &OpObservables, 
00224                                     S[a], S[b], obsme[a+b*n])) {
00225         calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, 
00226                           &Q[a], &Q[b], S[a], S[b], obsme[a+b*n]);
00227         writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], 
00228                                  &P, &OpObservables, S[a], S[b], obsme[a+b*n]);
00229       }
00230 
00231   // scale matrix elements
00232   if (Int.mescaling) {
00233     fprintf(stderr, "... scaling matrix elements\n");
00234     for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00235       for (a=0; a<n; a++)
00236         scaleprojectedObservablesMBME(&P, &Int, obsme[a+b*n]);
00237   }
00238 
00239 
00240 
00241   if (hermit)
00242     hermitizeprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, obsme, n);
00243 
00244   // read or calculate the Eigenstates
00245       
00246   double minnormp=0.001; int allp=0;
00247   Eigenstates Ep[n];
00248   Observablesod** obsp = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpObservables, 1);
00249   
00250   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00251     if (readEigenstatesfromFile(mbfile[i], &P, &Ep[i], 1)) {
00252       fprintf(stderr, "... calculating Eigenstates for %s\n", mbfile[i]);
00253       initEigenstates(&P, &Ep[i], 1);
00254       calcEigenstates(&P, &Int, &obsme[i+i*n], &Ep[i], threshkmix);
00255       calcexpectprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &obsme[i+i*n], &S[i], &Ep[i], obsp);
00256       sortEigenstates(&P, &Int, obsp, &Ep[i], minnormkmix, allp);
00257     }
00258   }
00259 
00260   // output
00261   FILE* outfp = stdout;
00262 
00263   fprintinfo(outfp);
00264   fprintProjectinfo(outfp, &P);
00265 
00266   fprintf(outfp, "\n# calculating subsets of dimension %d+%d\n", m0, m1);
00267 
00268   // Now we have the eigenstates and matrixelements for n Slater determinants
00269 
00270   // next step is to select subsets of m Slater determinants
00271 
00272   int m = m0+m1;
00273   int idx[m];
00274 
00275   Symmetry Ssel[m];
00276   Eigenstates Eselp[m] ;
00277   Observablesod** obsmesel[m*m];
00278   
00279   Eigenstates multiE;
00280   Amplitudes multiA;
00281   initEigenstates(&P, &multiE, m);
00282   initAmplitudes(&P, &multiA, m);
00283 
00284   Observablesod** obs = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpObservables, m);
00285 
00286   for (i=0; i<m; i++)
00287     idx[i] = i;
00288 
00289   do {
00290     intoidx(idx, idxfix, iidxsel, ridxsel, n, m1, m0);
00291 
00292     // Eselp and obsmesel are pointers to the selected
00293     // Eigenstates and matrixelements
00294 
00295     for (a=0; a<m; a++) {
00296       Ssel[a] = S[idx[a]];
00297       Eselp[a] = Ep[idx[a]];
00298     }
00299                       
00300     for (b=0; b<m; b++)
00301       for (a=0; a<m; a++)
00302         obsmesel[a+b*m] = obsme[idx[a]+idx[b]*n];
00303 
00304     // solve the eigenvalue problem
00305     calcMultiEigenstates(&P, &Int, obsmesel, &Eselp, &multiE, &multiA, threshmulti);
00306 
00307     // calculate expectation values
00308     calcexpectprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, obsmesel, Ssel, &multiE, obs);
00309 
00310     // sort Eigenstates
00311     sortEigenstates(&P, &Int, obs, &multiE, minnorm, all);
00312 
00313     // 
00314     fprintf(stdout, "\n###  ");
00315     for (a=0; a<m; a++)
00316       fprintf(stdout, "%s ", mbfile[idx[a]]);
00317     fprintf(stdout, "\n");
00318 
00319     showprojectedObservables(outfp, &P, &Int, &Q[0], obs, &multiE, &multiA, "");
00320 
00321   } while (nextpermutation(iidxsel, n-m0, m1));
00322 
00323   return 0;
00324 }
